p: Considering the fact that the percentage composition of thymol in T. ammi essential oil can be increased from 24.4% to about 85.0% by a two-step reaction via aromatization of Î³-terpinene to form p-cymene, followed by hydroxylation of p-cymene to offer thymol [ 44], this would make T. ammi essential oil one of the best sources of thymol.
